meanings.definition: The top part of a column or pillar
meanings.sent1: The chapiters of the ancient pillars were intricately carved.
meanings.sent2: The architect added beautiful chapiters to the columns of the building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel balanced acorns on the chapiters of the columns.
meanings.sent4: The chapiters stood proudly like crowns atop the pillars.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight illuminated the chapiters, making them gleam like jewels.

meanings.definition: A decorative element at the top of a column or pillar
meanings.sent1: The chapiters were adorned with delicate patterns and designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted unique chapiters for the grand hall's columns.
meanings.sent3: The playful pigeons perched on the chapiters, adding a whimsical touch.
meanings.sent4: The chapiters seemed to dance in the wind, bringing life to the stone pillars.
meanings.sent5: Visitors marveled at the intricate beauty of the chapiters on the ancient columns.
